name: ddr-finder
description: HTML5 DDR Locator Application (targeted at Mobile)

scripts.purgecss:metroui: purgecss --css web/metroui/css/modern*.css --content web/metroui/js/accordion.js web/*.html web/js/*.js --output web/metroui/css/purged
scripts.build:metroui: npm run unzip:metroui && mkdir -p web/metroui/css/purged && npm run purgecss:metroui && npm run minify:metroui
scripts.build: npm run build:metroui && npm run copy:jquery
